item.title: We launch I Has a Coupon!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: We folks at Brain Scan Studios are a busy lot. Traveling, sleeping, eating, and occasionally writing fills up our days. Somehow we got the time to launch a new blog, I Has a Coupon! It's basically a blog about deals, big deals, small deals, some as big as your head. Yes, I know I can hear your griping, the blog is badly in need of a design, but with the holidays and all we launched it so the awaiting public can get their hands on all those juicy discounts. Please enjoy.
